description: The walls of Carthage were famous for their height and width, not to mention the entire city was encircled by 3 of them. Walls extended even along the coast and surrounded the city's famous double harbors. The walls were never breached. Only when the Romans made a daring and successful raid into the city's commercial harbor did Carthage finally fall.
tooltip: Stone Walls 3x Health, 2x Build time, +50% Cost.
